title: Easy SMS Pro v3.3.0_[Android App]_{shilpa143}
description:
[img]http://s28.postimg.org/wvkb1ug0t/Easy_SMS_Pro_License_Key_Android_Apps_on_Google_Play_2013_12_18_17_48_46.png[/img]

Fastest SMS application ever on Android; message box style; scheduled messageÃ¯Â¼â€ºuser created folders, more functional plugins
Pansi SMS is a FAST, SIMPLE, COOL and FREE SMS application, which will bring you best text experience on Android.
It is a total enhancement for stock messaging application, with more cool features, beautiful UI and much faster.
=====FEATURES=====
- Full SMS/MMS support
- Support Inbox style as well as conversation style
- Scheduled SMS, you can use it even as your life reminders
- SMS Popup with quick reply
- Save the SMS content as a calendar content
- SMS backup to SD card and restore
- Signature for outgoing SMS
- Quick text, also support user defined quick text
- Beautiful widgets on desktop
- Support Emoji with Emoji plugin
- Support multi-language, including English, Traditional Chinese, Russian, Spanish, Korean, Greek ,Italian, Japanese, French, German, Swedish, Hungarian; get more language packages in market.
- Many cool themes, which can change backgrounds and other elements of the application
- Powerful customization for notifications, appearance and more
- Better group text SMS experience
- Unread message filter
- Support Samsung Galaxy S4 and HTC One
- Support 1080P Resolution
- Support iPhone 5 iOS 7 Theme
